languages.text: {n}Кибелла настороженно наблюдает за тем, как вы оскверняете свою плоть.{/n} "Довольно". {n}Черный клинок исчезает из ваших рук.{/n} "Священный ритуал ты превратил{mf||а} в осмеяние — пускай. Завет Паутины велит не держать зла. Но и участвовать в подобном я не желаю".

{n}Kibellah watches you warily as you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. The Tenets teach us to hold no ill will. But I will have no part in this."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла настороженно наблюдает за тем, как вы оскверняете свою плоть.{/n} "Довольно". {n}Черный клинок исчезает из ваших рук.{/n} "Священный ритуал ты превратил{mf||а} в осмеяние — пускай. Завет Паутины велит не держать зла. Но и участвовать в подобном я не желаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah guardedly watches you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. Ahn'shini teaches us to hold no ill will. But I will take no part in this."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah te observa con recelo mientras profanas tu propia carne.{/n} «Basta». {n}Te quita la daga de las manos.{/n} «Se ha burlado de un ritual sagrado. Sea, pues. La Doctrina nos enseña a no guardar rencor. Pero no formaré parte de esto».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah watches you warily as you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. The Tenets teach us to hold no ill will. But I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah te observa con recelo mientras profanas tu propia carne.{/n} «Basta». {n}Te quita la daga de las manos.{/n} «Se ha burlado de un ritual sagrado. Sea, pues. La Doctrina nos enseña a no guardar rencor. Pero no formaré parte de esto».

languages.text: {n}キベラは、あなたが自分自身の肉を傷つけるのを注意深く見ている。{/n}「十分よ」{n}彼女は、あなたの手からダガーを取り上げる。{/n}「あなたは神聖な儀式を愚弄した。いいでしょう。教義は私たちに悪意を抱いてはいけないと教えている。でも、私はこれには関与しない」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah watches you warily as you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. The Tenets teach us to hold no ill will. But I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは、あなたが自分自身の肉を傷つけるのを注意深く見ている。{/n}「十分よ」{n}彼女は、あなたの手からダガーを取り上げる。{/n}「あなたは神聖な儀式を愚弄した。いいでしょう。教義は私たちに悪意を抱いてはいけないと教えている。でも、私はこれには関与しない」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈警觉地看着你玷污自己的身体。{/n}“够了。”{n}她从你手里夺回了匕首。{/n}“你在嘲弄神圣的仪式，既然如此，就这样吧。织血罗网的教义教导我们不要对他人心怀恶念，但我绝不会参与这样的仪式。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah watches you warily as you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. The Tenets teach us to hold no ill will. But I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈警觉地看着你玷污自己的身体。{/n}“够了。”{n}她从你手里夺回了匕首。{/n}“你在嘲弄神圣的仪式，既然如此，就这样吧。织血罗网的教义教导我们不要对他人心怀恶念，但我绝不会参与这样的仪式。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah beobachtet dich misstrauisch, während du dein eigenes Fleisch entweihst.{/n} "Genug!" {n}Sie entwindet den Dolch aus deinen Händen.{/n} "Ihr habt das heilige Ritual verspottet. So sei es. Die Grundsätze lehren uns, keinen Groll zu hegen. Aber ich werde mich nicht daran beteiligen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah watches you warily as you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. The Tenets teach us to hold no ill will. But I will have no part in this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah beobachtet dich misstrauisch, während du dein eigenes Fleisch entweihst.{/n} "Genug!" {n}Sie entwindet den Dolch aus deinen Händen.{/n} "Ihr habt das heilige Ritual verspottet. So sei es. Die Grundsätze lehren uns, keinen Groll zu hegen. Aber ich werde mich nicht daran beteiligen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah vous observe d'un air circonspect alors que vous profanez vos propres chairs.{/n} « Ça suffit. » {n}Elle vous reprend sa dague des mains.{/n} « Vous avez tourné le rituel sacré en ridicule. Tant pis. Si les Préceptes condamnent toute forme de rancune, je refuse d'y être mêlée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah watches you warily as you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. The Tenets teach us to hold no ill will. But I will have no part in this."

Tant pis. Si les Préceptes condamnent toute forme de rancune, je refuse d'y être mêlée. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah watches you warily as you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. The Tenets teach us to hold no ill will. But I will have no part in this."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, kendi bedenine leke sürmeni temkinle izliyor.{/n} "Yeter." {n}Elindeki hançeri alıyor.{/n} "Bu kutsal ayini ayaklar altına aldın. Peki, öyle olsun. İlkeler bize kin tutmamayı tembih eder. Ama bu rezalete alet olmayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah watches you warily as you defile your own flesh.{/n} "Enough." {n}She takes her dagger from your hands.{/n} "You have made a mockery of the sacred ritual. So be it. The Tenets teach us to hold no ill will. But I will have no part in this."
